active_incidents.title: Some users may be experiencing issues loading threads or connecting to Slack.

notes.body: We’re still actively investigating this issue. In particular, about 1% of users may be experiencing slowness or errors when loading threads or using Slack. We’ll provide another update as soon as we have more information to share.

Some users might be experiencing connectivity issues when trying to connect to Slack or load threads.

We're currently investigating this issue and will provide another update once we have more details to share. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused.
